net.derquinse.common.io

Class MemoryByteSourceLoader

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.derquinse.common.io.MemoryByteSourceLoader

  • @ThreadSafe
public final class MemoryByteSourceLoader
extends Object
    Memory byte source loader.
    Author:
    Andres Rodriguez

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      MemoryByteSourceLoader chunkSize(int chunkSize)
      Returns a loader with the same configuration and the chunk size specified by the argument.
      MemoryByteSourceLoader direct(boolean direct)
      Returns a loader with the same configuration and the use of direct memory specified by the argument.
      boolean equals(Object obj) 
      static MemoryByteSourceLoader get()
      Gets the default loader.
      int getChunkSize()
      Returns the chunk size.
      int getMaxSize()
      Returns the maximum size.
      BytesTransformer getTransformer()
      Returns the transformer used.
      int hashCode() 
      boolean isDirect()
      Returns whether the loader uses direct memory.
      boolean isMerge()
      Returns whether the loader merges after loading.
      MemoryByteSource load(ByteSource source)
      Loads the contents of an existing source into a memory byte source.
      MemoryByteSource load(File file)
      Loads the contents of an existing file into a memory byte source.
      MemoryByteSource load(InputStream is)
      Loads the contents of the input stream into a memory byte source.
      MemoryByteSource load(InputSupplier<? extends InputStream> supplier)
      Loads the contents of an existing input supplier into a memory byte source.
      MemoryByteSourceLoader maxSize(int maxSize)
      Returns a loader with the same configuration and the maximum allowed size specified by the argument.
      MemoryByteSourceLoader merge(boolean merge)
      Returns a loader with the same configuration and that merges the source after loading according to the provided argument.
      MemoryByteSink newSink()
      Creates a new sink based on this loader.
      MemoryOutputStream openStream()
      Opens a new memory output stream.
      String toString() 
      MemoryByteSourceLoader transformer(ByteStreamTransformer transformer)
      Returns a loader with the same configuration and the transformer specified by the argument.

      • direct

        public MemoryByteSourceLoader direct(boolean direct)
        Returns a loader with the same configuration and the use of direct memory specified by the argument.
        Parameters:
        direct - True to use direct memory, false to use heap.

      • maxSize

        public MemoryByteSourceLoader maxSize(int maxSize)
        Returns a loader with the same configuration and the maximum allowed size specified by the argument.

        public MemoryByteSourceLoader chunkSize(int chunkSize)
        Returns a loader with the same configuration and the chunk size specified by the argument.

      • merge

        public MemoryByteSourceLoader merge(boolean merge)
        Returns a loader with the same configuration and that merges the source after loading according to the provided argument.
        Parameters:
        merge - Whether to merge after loading.

      • transformer

        public MemoryByteSourceLoader transformer(ByteStreamTransformer transformer)
        Returns a loader with the same configuration and the transformer specified by the argument.

        Opens a new memory output stream.

                      throws IOException
        Loads the contents of the input stream into a memory byte source.
        Parameters:
        is - Input stream. It is not closed.
        Returns:
